references.citationString: Fares, S., Alivernini, A., Chianucci, F., Conte, A., Ilardi, F., Moretti, V., Sorgi, T., ICOS RI, 2021. ICOS ETC Bio Meteo Raw ASCII, Castelporziano2, 2021-06-27, https://hdl.handle.net/11676/XuqIwW7q5rhVfF7J7sNMOY8F

comments: The station Castelporziano (ICOS code IT-Cp2) is located in the Presidential Estate of Castelporziano, 25 km SW from the center of Rome, Italy and covers an area of about 6000 ha. The undisturbed Mediterranean oak forest of Castelporziano Estate hosts an experimental tower 20 m tall. The forest is a pure Holm Oak stand with some shrubs in the understory.
self.label: IT-Cp2

comments: Lands dominated by trees with a percent cover >60% and height exceeding 2 meters. Consists of tree communities with interspersed mixtures or mosaics of the other four forest types. None of the forest types exceeds 60% of landscape.
ecosystemType.label: Mixed Forests

self.label: ICOS ETC Bio Meteo Raw ASCII
